basicInfo.name: Aaron
basicInfo.flavor: Consumed by his obsession with power, Aaron struck a deal with the devil. Though he gained tremendous power, his body and mind are no longer his own.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Tornado Slash
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 85% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Incoming Healing Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 85% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Effect: Incoming Healing Reduction to 32%.

Passive.name: Keen Swordsman
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Weakness Hit Chance Boost. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Weakness Hit Chance Boost to 15%.

profile.story:
A swordsman whose obsession with getting stronger led to his fall from grace.
He traveled all the way to Purgatory in search of greater power.
While he did get stronger fighting various monsters within Purgatory, he realized that he was still far too weak to match the likes of Clops and Knox. So he made a pact with a demon to get even more power.
Despite almost losing his body and soul to the demon, he still couldn't measure up to either of them.
No one has seen his face because he doesn't take his helmet off. The rumors say that he's quite handsome, though.

basicInfo.name: Aaron
basicInfo.flavor: Aaron became a powerful swordsman by battling the demons of the underground. But as his reputation grew, so did his thirst for power.
